resources:
Getting started with CrowdNode To start staking, create an account on CrowdNode or connect to an existing one. New Account Create Account Link Account I Have Account I have an account You must backup your passphrase Backup Passphrase You need at least %s Dash We didn’t see any CrowdNode transactions in this wallet You can restore your Dash Wallet that is connected to your CrowdNode account. Please restore your Dash Wallet that is connected to your CrowdNode account. CrowdNode uses this address as your account ID. You will lose access to your funds in within this wallet and your CrowdNode account if you lose the passphrase associated to this address. Very small amounts of Dash will be sent to CrowdNode to verify that you are the owner of this wallet address. Dash Address Restore Dash Wallet To create an account on CrowdNode your Dash Wallet should be secured If you lose your passphrase for this wallet and lose this device or uninstall Dash Wallet, you will lose access to your funds on CrowdNode and the funds within this wallet. You have insufficient funds to proceed. You should have at least %s Dash to proceed with the CrowdNode verification. I agree to CrowdNode %1$s and %2$s Terms of use Privacy Policy Your CrowdNode account is set up and ready to use! Let me know when it’s done Your CrowdNode account is creating\nDo not close the app… Accepting terms of use… We couldn’t create your CrowdNode account.
https://crowdnode.io/terms/ https://crowdnode.io/privacy/`
